thread.title: GoGo Squeez Applesauce Pouches Recalled Over Mold
thread.title_full: GoGo Squeez Applesauce Pouches Recalled Over Mold - US News

author: USNews
title: GoGo Squeez Applesauce Pouches Recalled Over Mold
text:
GoGo Squeez Applesauce Pouches Recalled Over Mold 'Mold is gross,' the company said in a statement. By Lauren Boyer Oct. 16, 2015 | 2:28 p.m. EDT + More GoGo Squeez is recalling applesauce pouches due to possible mold.
"We know mold is gross and unpleasant to look at or taste," the company said in a statement.
The mold — the kind that forms on fruit — was tested in a lab. According to the company, it poses "no known health risk."
Affected applesauce pouches have a best-before date of 6/30/16-7/26/16. None of the company's other items are impacted.
TAGS: recalls
